3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to your dream home in McKinley Village! This stunning property offers the perfect blend of modern luxury and comfort. Situated on one of the largest corner lots in the community, this spacious 6,229 sqft lot boasts a landscaped backyard with a flourishing nectarine tree, awaits your ideas to create a serene outdoor oasis. Step inside, and you'll be greeted by an abundance of natural light that flows through the entire home, thanks to its thoughtfully designed layout. The gourmet chef's kitchen is a true delight, featuring stainless steel appliances and ample counter space, making it the heart of this home and a haven for culinary enthusiasts. Plantation shutters adorn the windows throughout, adding a very elegant touch. The open-concept living and dining areas are perfect for entertaining, and they seamlessly connect to the outdoor covered patio, where you can enjoy al fresco dining and relaxation year-round. Convenience is at your doorstep, with this home ideally situated between East Sacramento and Midtown. You'll have easy access to a vibrant array of restaurants, shops, and cultural attractions, making this location perfect for those who want to experience the best of Sacramento's urban living.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to the heart of East Sacramento, where timeless elegance meets vintage charm. This exquisite mid-century home, with its nostalgic allure, offers a rare opportunity to own a piece of architectural history. Boasting 3 beds and 1 bath, this beautiful residence promises a comfortable and cozy lifestyle. Step inside and be enchanted by the abundance of original details that define this home. Hardwood floors gleam underfoot, showcasing their timeless beauty and adding warmth to the entry way and bedrooms. The living area is adorned with a classic fireplace, inviting you to cozy up on chilly evenings and create lasting memories with loved ones. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to this delightful residence in the heart of East Sacramento! This charming home boasts three well-appointed bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms in the main house, with an additional bedroom and full bathroom in a beautifully designed backyard guest suite. Inside, you'll find a warm and inviting living & dining area, perfect for both everyday living and entertaining guests. The remodeled kitchen is a dream, featuring stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and beautiful cabinetry, with a cozy spot to enjoy your morning coffee. The bathrooms have also been tastefully updated, enhancing the home's modern comfort.Original hardwood floors add character to most areas, seamlessly blending with tile and engineered flooring. The thoughtful design includes a bonus room with a cozy fireplace, providing extra comfort and versatility.A unique highlight of this property is the detached guest suite, equipped with a mini-split system, abundant natural light, and ample storage, making it an ideal space for guests or a home office. Enjoy the tree-lined streets of East Sacramento, Compton's Market, local eateries, parks, and quick freeway access. This property is ideal for those seeking a blend of comfort, character, and community in one of Sacramento's most desirable neighborhoods.

French doors from the primary bedroom lead you to a large covered balcony overlooking a picturesque backyard, complete with an arbor and solar heated pool (with removable fence). RV parking behind auto gate. The home is in the coveted Theodore Judah Elementary school district and is close to parks and shopping.

Confidential Remarks: Vacant with a lockbox so please go and show without using ShowingTime. Successor Trustee sale and being sold As Is. Owner passed away in the property of natural causes. Please include Pre-Approval and POF with any offer. Offers will be presented as received. Thank you for showing and we look forward to presenting your offer.

Public Remarks: Imagine living in the lovely classically styled McKinley Park home. The home features four bedrooms (2 down and 2 up) and two full bathrooms with hardwood floors downstairs, formal living and dining rooms plus a bonus/entertainment room. Plus, it has a terrific park-like back yard with a pool and great entertainment space. The home is ideally located for enjoying the many amenities of living in East Sacramento's McKinley Park neighborhood just a stones throw away from McKinley Park and schools, restaurants, shops and offices nearby. The location is also great for commuting with quick access to the Capital City freeway, RT bus service and bike lanes.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This fully updated East Sac house is on a large-sized lot and has plenty to offer. Kitchen and bathroom renovations were completed in 2022. The kitchen was fully renovated to an open concept with and island and plenty of storage. Office/bedroom downstairs and three bedrooms upstairs, which includes a large primary bedroom with newly designed walk-in closet, this house has an ideal layout. All three full bathrooms have new built-in cabinetry and more. The hardwood floors throughout have been refinished and stained. In the backyard you'll find a gorgeous built-in pool and spa (with new heater 2023). The composition roof on the house was installed in 2018. The garage roof was installed in 2021 and is off Eggplant Alley, with room to add additional garage or guest house. All of this on a tree lined street close to everything you love about East Sac including McKinley Park, Comptons Market, Temple Coffee, restaurants, and close to UC Davis/Sutter hospitals. Welcome to East Sac!
